name: They Fear The Light
description:
A Survival Horror Game. Players will find themselves enveloped by dark, having only their sense of hearing to stay away from danger, along with their not-so-handy-dandy flashlight. Find your exit out of a maze you cannot see, surrounded by entities you don't want to see. 

Press E to use the Flashlight, WASD, and Mouse for Movement controls. Esc for Pause. 

This game was developed for the Global Game Jam 2022

Developed by SideStreetGames
